name: LostBoy
description:
Story

Ignis, the mc, is a ghostlike entity commonly known as Wisp; they are the spirit of a child that died in the depths of a marsh. They get very lonely very easily, and resort to “kidnap” a child, Billy. Billy is very small, and easily scared; the bog is pretty dangerous, as such is your job to keep Billy safe while you make sure he follows you.

Gameplay

Simple puzzle game, tap on a point to go there, tap on yourself to shine and lead Billy there; make sure he doesn’t get lost or hurt.
